episode_event_general_ch0247_00_dande/67:
Hey, Gloria! I can feel the excitement in the air!
This place sure reminds me of Galar!

Yeah! Everyone’s pumped up because you
all came!

Hello hello, Pasio! Your Galar Champion,
Leon, is here!

I promise I’ll keep doing my best to deliver the
greatest battles for you all to watch!

I’m looking forward to seeing your teamwork with
Charizard!

Thanks for the support! Let’s all have a
champion time!

Looks like your reputation as the unbeatable Leon
precedes you here on Pasio as well.

Hey, Gloria an’ I are gonna have some battles,
too, y’know!

Yeah, Marnie! We’ll just have to show them what
we’re made of when we have our matches!

[Name:PlayerNickname ], you have to come
and cheer us on!
We’ll see you at the arena!
episode_event_general_ch0247_00_dande/42:
The artificial island of
Pasio...looks like a lot
of fun!

It’s one of the duties of the Champion to get the
crowd fired up!
That doesn’t change, even here on Pasio!
We’re going to have a champion time!
episode_event_general_ch0247_00_dande/64:
Time to start something fun!
Keep on aiming for that 
Champion title!
episode_event_general_ch0247_00_dande/65:
Congrats! You’re doing a 
fantastic job! Keep up the
good work!
